trans-unit.source: Represents the base class for all exceptions caused by rule evaluation issues.
trans-unit.target: Representerer basisklasse for alle unntak skyldes regelen evalueringen problemer.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleEvaluationException"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleEvaluationException"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: This constructor initializes the <xref:System.Exception.Message%2A> property of the new instance to a system-supplied message that describes the error and takes into account the current system culture.
trans-unit.target: Denne konstruktøren initialiserer den <xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>for den nye forekomsten til en system-angitt melding som beskriver problemet og tar hensyn til den gjeldende kulturen i systemet.</xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleEvaluationException>.
trans-unit.target: Tabellen nedenfor viser første egenskapsverdiene for en forekomst av <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleEvaluationException>.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleEvaluationException>

trans-unit.source: |Property|Value| |--------------|-----------| |<xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>|A null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic).| |<xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>|A system-supplied localized description.|
trans-unit.target: | Egenskapen | Verdien | |--------------|-----------| | <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>| En nullreferanse (`Nothing` i Visual Basic). | | <xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>| En system-angitt lokalisert beskrivelse. |</xref:System.Exception.Message%2A> </xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleEvaluationException"></xref> class with a specified error message.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleEvaluationException"> </xref> klassen med en angitt feilmelding.

trans-unit.source: This constructor initializes the <xref:System.Exception.Message%2A> property of the new instance using the `message` parameter.
trans-unit.target: Denne konstruktøren initialiserer den <xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>for ny forekomst med den `message` parameteren.</xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleEvaluationException>.
trans-unit.target: Tabellen nedenfor viser første egenskapsverdiene for en forekomst av <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleEvaluationException>.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleEvaluationException>

trans-unit.source: |Property|Value| |--------------|-----------| |<xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>|A null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic).| |<xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>|The error message string.|
trans-unit.target: | Egenskapen | Verdien | |--------------|-----------| | <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>| En nullreferanse (`Nothing` i Visual Basic). | | <xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>| Feil melding strengen. |</xref:System.Exception.Message%2A> </xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>

trans-unit.source: The message that describes the error.
trans-unit.target: Meldingen som beskriver problemet.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleEvaluationException"></xref> class with serialized data.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleEvaluationException"> </xref> klasse serialiserte dataene.

trans-unit.source: This constructor is called during de-serialization to reconstitute the exception object transmitted over a stream.
trans-unit.target: Denne konstruktøren kalles under deserialisering til reconstitute unntak objektet overføres via en dataflyt.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> that holds the serialized object data about the exception being thrown.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"> </xref> som inneholder den serialiserte objektdata om som oppstod et unntak.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext> that contains contextual information about the source or destination.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>som inneholder kontekstavhengig informasjon om kilden eller målet.</xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleEvaluationException"></xref> class, with a specified error message and a reference to the inner <xref:System.Exception> that is the cause of this <xref:System.Exception>.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleEvaluationException"> </xref> klassen med en angitt feilmelding og en referanse til det interne <xref:System.Exception>som er årsaken til denne <xref:System.Exception>.</xref:System.Exception> </xref:System.Exception>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Exception> that is thrown as a direct result of a previous <xref:System.Exception> should include a reference to the previous exception in the <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Exception>som er registrert som en direkte resultatet av en tidligere <xref:System.Exception>må inkludere en referanse til det tidligere unntaket i den <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> </xref:System.Exception> </xref:System.Exception>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property returns the same value that is passed into the constructor, or a null reference (`Nothing`) if the <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property does not supply the inner <xref:System.Exception> value to the constructor.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>egenskapen returnerer samme verdi som er sendt til konstruktøren, eller en nullreferanse (`Nothing`) Hvis den <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>egenskapen leverer ikke indre <xref:System.Exception>verdien til konstruktøren.</xref:System.Exception> </xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> </xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleEvaluationException>.
trans-unit.target: Tabellen nedenfor viser første egenskapsverdiene for en forekomst av <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleEvaluationException>.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleEvaluationException>

trans-unit.source: |Property|Value| |--------------|-----------| |<xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>|The inner <xref:System.Exception> reference.| |<xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>|The error message string.|
trans-unit.target: | Egenskapen | Verdien | |--------------|-----------| | <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>| Indre <xref:System.Exception>referansen. | | <xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>| Feil melding strengen. |</xref:System.Exception.Message%2A> </xref:System.Exception> </xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>

trans-unit.source: The message that describes the error.
trans-unit.target: Meldingen som beskriver problemet.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Exception> that is the cause of the current <xref:System.Exception> .
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Exception>Som er årsaken til gjeldende <xref:System.Exception>.</xref:System.Exception> </xref:System.Exception>

trans-unit.source: If the `innerException` parameter is not a null reference (<xref uid="langword_csharp_Nothing" name="Nothing" href=""></xref> in Visual Basic), the current <xref:System.Exception> is raised in a catch block that handles the inner <xref:System.Exception> .
trans-unit.target: Hvis den `innerException` -parameteren er ikke en nullreferanse (<xref uid="langword_csharp_Nothing" name="Nothing" href=""> </xref> i Visual Basic), i gjeldende <xref:System.Exception>blir opphøyd i en catch-blokk som behandler indre <xref:System.Exception>.</xref:System.Exception> </xref:System.Exception>
